title: Cull the Stalkers
premise: Rysa wants the forest route cleared for supply runners.

steps.text: Defeat wild stalkers prowling the forest path.

title: Lost Camp Relics
premise: Archivist Miro needs relic shards to rebuild the camp archive.

steps.text: Collect relic shards scattered near the ruins.

title: Escort the Scribe
premise: Scribe Ilen must reach the ruin gate safely.

steps.text: Keep Scribe Ilen close until she reaches the gate.

title: Ritual Alignment
premise: Activate the ritual stones in order to stabilize the ruins.

title: Break the Brute
premise: A cave brute blocks the gate. Learn its pattern and bring it down.

steps.text: Reach the cave gate and draw out the brute.
Defeat the cave brute after it charges.

title: Silence the Casters
premise: Rogue seers are disrupting the camp's wards.

steps.text: Disrupt rogue seers at the lake shore.

title: Lake Residue
premise: Herbalist Nera needs shimmering residue from the lake.

steps.text: Collect residue samples along the lake.

title: Hermit's Note
premise: Courier Vale needs a note delivered to the hermit.

steps.text: Deliver the sealed note to Hermit Orren.

title: Ward the Ruins
premise: A guardian stirs among the ruins. Channel energy into the wards.

steps.text: Defeat the ruin guardian and recover its ward core.
Return the ward core to Archivist Miro.
